title.narrative: International Lesbian Gay Bisexual Trans and Intersex Association Empowering LGBTI Human Rights Defenders in Global South

description.narrative: Full title: Empowering LGBTI Human Rights Defenders in Global South to Advocate Effectively at the UN and National Levels Against Discrimination Based on Sexual Orientation Gender Identity and Gender Expression and Sex Characteristics An expansion project of ILGA funded by the Finnish MFA that will build capacity for local and regional LGBTI organizations and human rights defenders in the Global South and developing nations through strategic trainings conferences UN advocacy work community-based research an d strengthening activities for regional LGBTI networks. The target regions of the project are Africa Asia Latin America + Caribbean and developing nations in Oceania. The aims of the project are to work towards decriminalization of LGBTI people decrease th e violence that LGBTI people experience on a daily basis increase global awareness of LGBTI issues in developing and improve non-discrimination legislation in targeted countries.
